a unique and eclectic band lays it down .
playing the keys and giving the band some flair

output.sentences: The musicians were playing their set using acoustic guitars.
The rest of the band was very unique and wore eclectic clothing and hair styles.
The keyboardist focused on the keys as he was playing.
Finally the lead guitarist came out and the crowd went wild.
It was clear that he was a really talented singer from the way he provided the vocals to the group.
